title: Korean Illustration
description:
This book contains game illustrations from the artists who created today's popular Korean illustration basics and 15 up-and-coming Korean artists, Kim Hyung-Tae, Opon, isanbon, popcorn, NG NoranGom, Shukei, Limha Lekan, Tiv, SR, YiLee, Isurugi, SeeD, MonsterGOGO, panamaman, maggi! 

Includes over 200 illustrations of game visuals, character illustrations, and original art work on top of a special interview with artists.
